name: Green Elder
description: A green elder pot could be a decorative or functional pot specifically chosen or crafted for growing elder plants, adding a touch of color and style to the cultivation of these botanicals. The choice of a green hue may align with natural aesthetics or personal preferences in garden or interior decor.
